ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] What happens when you go LD...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard rumors that casters will launch whatever is in his/her 1st gem slot, the bottom one I believe... I was in OoT at the buccaneer camp, when along came
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard rumors that casters will launch whatever is in his/her 1st gem
slot, the bottom one I believe... I was in OoT at the buccaneer camp, when
along came a druid to nuke the buc... I told him I was camping it, he said
sorry, but after he had rooted it. He was sitting down to camp when root
broke and attacked him sitting nearby. He just said forget it and used /q
command. After he had the [LD] after his name, his character stood up and
fired two nukes (whatever he had loaded at the time) at the poor thing and
killed it. So there is certainly some crazy things going on after you go LD.

Pava
